::DevilDuer/Zardus::

DevilDuer arrives back at the Alliance base, throwing Nemesis Enforcer into a 
CR chamber. He walks back to the bridge, looking at the scanners.

"Zardus," he says into his comm-link, "The newcomers and the predacons have 
retreated. I suggest you call the Alliance out of there before we butcher the 
maxi's."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In between shots at Iron Raptor, Zardus recieves the transmission from 
DevilDuer, nodding.

"Excelent," he replies, continuing to fire at Iron Raptor. With a silent 
command, he switches his comm-link to transmitt to all Alliance members.

"All Alliance member," he says into it over the sound of his own guns firing, 
"Return to base. I will be there shortly."
